name: The Survival Experience
description: Hello, Viewer! Welcome to this game's webpage. This is a survival game demo I created. It contains the basics that form a survival game: hunger/thirst management, inventory management, and other features.  It even has a multiplayer feature that works some of the time! I'm very proud of it, but if you find any bugs or want to provide some constructive feedback for my next game, feel free to let me know in the form of a comment. I hope you check this game out!
